testcase.description: Topology to use STA-----AP Description Config a ssid with wpa-aes-psk Pre-condition -config a ssid with wpa-tkip-psk -config a user-profile,with a vlan id -bind the user-profile to the ssid Test procedure -client connect to ssid with the correct psk -check the auth method on client is correct,client passes auth successfully -check the ip got from DHCP is correct -ping the gateway,success -ping for 10 min,traffic is not broken -client reconnects success Expect result 1.Client connection successful 2.Check the 4 way hankshake debug info,pmk is correct 3.Check the 2 way handshake,the group key install is success 4.Check the roaming cache adding is correct, ‘sh roa ca mac xxxx’ 5.Check station state, ‘sh ssid xxx st’, ‘sh auth’ 6.Check the client gets the correct ip from DHCP server 7.Make sure the traffic run well,ping gateway for 10 minutes
